name: Spooktacular tycoon
description:
Halloween is around the corner

And what does that means other than the demand for pumpkins increasing by ∞%.
This year, you take advantage of this opportunity and start a pumpkin farm. Grow your farm and take to out of this world methods to grow your wealth to unimaginable levels.

Features
  • 10 different "Levels". Sacrifice whatever it takes to make it further. Can you make it to the end?
  • 5 unique songs.
  • 15 upgrades with practically infinite levels

The game is saved every minute, you can also manually save in the menu.

The games saved data is automatically loaded on start-up.

Controls

Your mouse is the main control. There are some key binds however:

  • Esc - Close any open menu
  • S - open the shop
  • M - open the market
  • A - open the altar

Spooktacular tycoon is best played in full screen.

Credit

Programming and visuals was done by Seyloj

Music was generated in using Ecrett under the individual paid subscription.

All sound effects and the fonts (Except the one in the buttons) are from Kenney
